title: Dealing With Stress
question_text:
$130$ teenagers were surveyed to identify what activity they partake in to deal with stress. The results are shown below.
Which of the following statements cannot be supported by the graph?

choices.text: Most of the surveyed teenagers deal with stress by Playing With Video Games.
About $15$% of the surveyed teenagers deal with stress by Eating.
The total number of students who deal with stress by Eating and Watching TV is less than the number of students who deal with stress by Playing Video Games.
The number of students surveyed who deal with stress by Eating or Crafts is the same as Watching TV.
About $12$% of the surveyed teenagers deal with stress by Exercising.
